CustomField.formula: IF (NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(target_market__c ))), (HYPERLINK("https://trustedshops."+ CASE (target_market__c, "AUT","at/bewertung/info_", "BEL",CASE(language__c,"nl","be/nl/verkopersbeoordeling/info_","be/fr/evaluation/info_"), "FRA","fr/evaluation/info_", "DEU","de/bewertung/info_", "GBR","co.uk/buyerrating/info_", "ITA","it/valutazione-del-negozio/info_", "NLD","nl/verkopersbeoordeling/info_", "POL","pl/opinia/info_", "CHE","ch/bewertung/info_", "ESP","es/evaluacion/info_", "PRT","pt/avaliacao/info_", "ROU","eu/buyerrating/info_", "SWE","eu/buyerrating/info_", "DNK","eu/buyerrating/info_", "CZE","eu/buyerrating/info_", "EUO","eu/buyerrating/info_", "AT","at/bewertung/info_", "BE",CASE(language__c,"nl","be/nl/verkopersbeoordeling/info_","be/fr/evaluation/info_"), "FR","fr/evaluation/info_", "DE","de/bewertung/info_", "GB","co.uk/buyerrating/info_", "IT","it/valutazione-del-negozio/info_", "NL","nl/verkopersbeoordeling/info_", "PL","pl/opinia/info_", "CH","ch/bewertung/info_", "ES","es/evaluacion/info_", "PT","pt/avaliacao/info_", "RO","eu/buyerrating/info_", "SE","eu/buyerrating/info_", "DK","eu/buyerrating/info_", "CZ","eu/buyerrating/info_", "EU","eu/buyerrating/info_", "not available") +ts2_id__c+".html","Show Shop Profile")), "No Shop Profile available") & "" & IF( Using_eTrusted_Invite_Conversion_Feature__c, BR() + HYPERLINK("https://employees.trustedshops.com/analytics/invite-conversion?analyticsChannelId="+ eTrusted_Channel_Reference__c, "Invite Conversion Dashboard"),"")
CustomField.label: Shop Insights
